Features.MixingBowl.SpeedMultiplier.Desc: Change the speed at which the player combines resources within a mixing bowl. Acts as a direct multiplier. Min: 0.0, Max: 10.0, Default: 1.0.
Features.MixingBowl.IncludeAutomated.Des: Apply the speed multiplier to powered mixing bowls, as well as manual mixing bowls.
Features.MixingBowl.ModMenu.lblDescripti: Provides an easier way for players to mix resources in a mixing bowl.
Features.MixingBowl.ModMenu.lblSpeedMult: Determines the multiplier to apply to the speed of using the mixing bowl
Features.MixingBowl.ModMenu.lbIncludeAut: Determines whether to apply the speed multiplier to automated mixing bowls
Features.MixingBowl.ModMenu.lbStickyMous: When active, the user will not need to keep the right-mouse button held down to keep the mixing bowl active
